attributes.action: lobby the RFU and the FA to move one of the matches on September 8th 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Saturday 8th September 2007 at 5pm (BST) the English football team will be taking on Israel in a Euro2008 Qualifier.

On Saturday 8th September 2007 at 5pm (BST) the English rugby team will be taking on the USA in the Rugby World Cup.

Despite the Prime Minister being Scottish, I am sure he can understand why playing two high-profile internationals like this frustrates passionate sports fans who enjoy both rugby and football.

Please can the Prime Minister get his Minister of Sport to knock a few heads together and stop this madness.
